dcterms:creator: D. Yang
Y. Wang
A. Dantcheva
L. Garattoni
G. Francesca
F. Bremond
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset containing 142,000 real-world video clips of 320 action classes with corresponding 2D and 3D skeletons, used for pre-training action representation learning frameworks.
dcterms:title: Posetics

dcterms:creator: S. Das
R. Dai
M. Koperski
L. Minciullo
L. Garattoni
F. Bremond
G. Francesca
dcterms:description: A real-world dataset for daily living action classification containing 16,115 videos of 31 action classes, providing RGB videos, 2D and 3D skeleton data.
dcterms:title: Toyota Smarthome

dcterms:creator: T. Li
J. Liu
W. Zhang
Y. Ni
W. Wang
Z. Li
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 22,476 video sequences collected by a flying UAV, including 2D skeleton data estimated for human behavior understanding.
dcterms:title: UAV-Human

dcterms:creator: W. Zhang
M. Zhu
K. G. Derpanis
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 2,326 video sequences of 15 different actions, used for action recognition with 2D skeletons obtained from video data.
dcterms:title: Penn Action

dcterms:creator: A. Shahroudy
J. Liu
T.-T. Ng
G. Wang
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset consisting of 56,880 sequences of high-quality 3D skeletons captured by the Microsoft Kinect v2 sensor, used for 3D human activity analysis.
dcterms:title: NTU-RGB+D 60

dcterms:creator: J. Liu
A. Shahroudy
M. Perez
G. Wang
L. Y. Duan
A. C. Kot
dcterms:description: An extension of NTU-RGB+D 60, this dataset includes 114,480 videos across 120 action classes, providing 3D skeleton sequences for action recognition.
dcterms:title: NTU-RGB+D 120

dcterms:creator: Inc., A. S.
dcterms:description: A collection of approximately 2,400 unique motion sequences, including various actions and dancing moves, applicable to different characters with a shared human skeleton topology.
dcterms:title: Mixamo
